title: Social Studies Learning Competency Enhancement Program Using Digital Textbooks

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies concepts and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: A process that stimulates interest in social studies through digital textbooks and evaluates application skills via project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain social studies concepts with 90% accuracy by utilizing multimedia elements (audio, images, videos) in digital textbooks.
Learners can write analytical reports on social phenomena using digital textbooks and achieve a grade of B+ or higher in project-based assessments.
Learners can propose three strategies to enhance the efficiency of social studies learning based on their experience using digital textbooks.

resources: Android-Based Digital Textbook (Including Social Science Content)
Social Studies Supplementary Materials (Maps, Statistical Data, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
